post.title: fs/ft: lnib iphone 3gs 16gb white - fido locked/os3.0 unlocked/jailbroken!
post.content: i've got a lnib iphone 3gs - white in colour. locked to fido but i'm using it with rogers with full 3g. unlocked completely and on os 3.0. looking to sell for $650 flat or trade for a bnib/lnib blackberry bold only+cash! not looking for any other trade option. pm me for offers! gta/cash only! thanks for looking!
